summary: Group of dancers put Lorca's 'Blood Wedding' on stage, the tragic play about a married man who is still in love with his ex girlfriend, and tries to get back to her despite her planned wedding.
cast: Antonio Gades|Cristina Hoyos|Juan Antonio Jiménez|Carmen Villena|Pilar Cárdenas|El Güito|Lario Díaz|Enrique Esteve|Elvira Andrés|Azucena Flores|Cristina Gombau|Marisa Neila|Antonio Quintana|Quico Franco|Candy Román|José Mercé|Gómez de Jerez|Marisol|Pepe Blanco
title: Bodas de sangre
